text:
e="preserve">Orcières is a commune in the Hautes-Alpes department.
Road.
The D76, D474, D475 and D944 roads pass through the commune of Orcières.
Ski resort.
The commune has a ski resort called Orcières-Merlette.
Geography.
Orcières is on the edge of the Écrins National Park. It is also around 10 miles away from the border with the Isere department and 23 miles away from the border with the France-Italy border.
